snippet: Compromises on nuclear power have placed the Green Party’s leadership at odds with its base, and some are wondering if the Greens’ alliance with the Socialist Party can survive.
abstract: French Pres Francois Hollande, in effort to defuse tension between the Socialists and Greens, announces plans to move up the planned closing of France's oldest nuclear plant by about six months, to the end of 2016.
lead_paragraph: Compromises on nuclear power have placed the Green Party’s leadership at odds with its base, and some are wondering if the Greens’ alliance with the Socialist Party can survive.

headline.seo: Energy Policy Divides Governing Coalition in France
headline.main: Energy Policy in France Divides Governing Coalition of Socialists and Greens
headline.print_headline: Energy Policy in France Divides Governing Coalition of Socialists and Greens
